alert.note: Alert for Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 05 at 2:22AM CST until March 05 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Possible Late Saturday Morning through Saturday Afternoon... .Strong winds associated with a low pressure system combined with dry air could promote critical fire weather conditions across parts of north central Kansas late Saturday morning through Saturday afternoon. Winds will start Saturday morning from the southwest, becoming westerly early in the afternoon and finally northwesterly by mid to late afternoon. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 019... The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 10 AM this morning to 7 PM CST this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 019 Mitchell. * WINDS...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * TIMING...Late Saturday morning through Saturday afternoon. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and exhibit extreme fire behavior. Use extreme caution if engaging in activities that could lead to fire ignition.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
